title: How to Make a Light Bulb Oil Lamp

steps.headline: Remove the contact by using a pair of pliers.
Poke the insulator using a sharp tool like a screwdriver.
Carefully break inner parts of bulb with the screwdriver.
Pull them out with the pliers.
Discard all broken parts and clean the light bulb.
Obtain washers.
steps.description: The washer should have a hole just enough to fit the cotton string.

steps.headline: Glue the washer on top opening of the hollowed light bulb.
Obtain a block of wood for the base.
Carve out a hole for the light bulb to sit in.
Obtain a cotton string and cut it about 5 inches.
Thread the cotton string passing through the opening of the light bulb.
steps.description: Apply glue on the base of the light bulb and put it on top of the wooden block.

text: Obtain a light bulb.  Remove the contact by using a pair of pliers.  Poke the insulator using a sharp tool like a screwdriver.  Carefully break inner parts of bulb with the screwdriver.  Pull them out with the pliers.  Discard all broken parts and clean the light bulb.  Obtain washers. The washer should have a hole just enough to fit the cotton string. Glue the washer on top opening of the hollowed light bulb.  Obtain a block of wood for the base.  Carve out a hole for the light bulb to sit in.  Apply wood stain.  Obtain a cotton string and cut it about 5 inches.  Thread the cotton string passing through the opening of the light bulb. Apply glue on the base of the light bulb and put it on top of the wooden block. Inject oil or alcohol.  Light it up!  Finished.
